entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
